name: James is bananas
description:
A double game mechanic, classic platformer and runner, free the banana village from the evil king gorilla by punching and breaking stuff but halfway each level, gear up, it's time to shoot some gummy bears!

Gameplay:

  • Multiplayer game “2 player” in the main story mode. (Not finished, will release as an update after game launch)
  • Arcade mode, high score game, both on single and multiplayer. (Not finished)
  • Platformer, run, jump and punch objects to break them.
  • Runner, jump and slide through the obstacles, shoot the gummy bears but this comes with a twist, the bullet has to match the gummy bear color.
